original_text: After the earthquake came a fire, but the Lord was not in the fire. And after the fire came a gentle whisper.
korean_text: 또 지진 후에 불이 있으나 불 가운데에도 여호와께서 계시지 아니하더니 불 후에 세미한 소리가 있는지라

sentences.original_text: After the earthquake came a fire,
but the Lord was not in the fire.
And after the fire came a gentle whisper.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 불이 난 후 부드러운 속삭임이 왔다.
